yep. 1:32 in 23.976 fps, Plus two introductory Studio signature, we are far from the full version..
Comparing with the DVD there are also some re-arangment of the scenes, which do not follow the same order..
May be if i have some time I'll edit a special release of the "missing scenes"..if you encourage me to do so
no fappable material on this version then?
